snippet.title: Adele Following the Signs Gameplay (PC HD)
snippet.description:
Adele Following the Signs pc gameplay (no commentary). "Adele: Following the Signs" is a 2.5D puzzle-platformer horror game for pc/steam. 

The year is 2029. It is the end of the world. Take on the role of Mike; who is in the woods with his daughter, fleeing from an attacking wave of zombies. During the escape, Mike slips, falls and loses consciousness. He awakes to find that Adele is nowhere to be found. His only chance in finding her is to follow the signs. 

Let's Play - Adele Following the Signs - Gameplay PC 60fps 1080p Steam
Game Genre: Platformer, Adventure, Indie
Game Platform: Windows (PC), OS X (Mac), Linux
Genre: Horror, Platformer, Adventure, Indie
Developer: Unosquare
Release Date: 3 Jun, 2016

Adele: Following the Signs Game Related Links
► Subscribe for Adele: Following the Signs Game Videos - https://goo.gl/IBAiuP
► Adele: Following the Signs PC Game Download - http://store.steampowered.com/app/457980/
► Adele: Following the Signs Game Info - http://www.adelegame.com/
► Adele: Following the Signs Gameplay Trailer - PC/Steam Release - https://youtu.be/c2GWkqVbUQo

★Adele: Following the Signs Game Features★
- 19 challenging levels
- Zombies, attacking Plants and Monster Bosses
- A special bonus for those who can pass each level without dying
- Enemies and obstacles that will require both brains and skill to overcome

Adele is not meant to be a zombie killing game. Players have to strategically maneuver objects to block their path, run away or trap zombies into falling in order to escape them. The game is set in different environments which impact your interaction with the zombies, being in a factory is going to be different than in the countryside, or underground. 

------------------
